proyectos.description: Do you need to find a census book for the city of Barcelona from after 1930? This app can help you! Just enter and filter by street, district, or year.
It's just like the hangman game, but with movies! Designed for seniors to exercise their memory by recalling their favorite films.
Do you need help organizing your trips? Freeway is the solution. An easy App to save and manage all your travel information
Drop a file and upload it to Google Drive. This project was made for the selection process of the Hackathon competition: CruzRoja2022.
Management of cinema ticket sales and purchases. Data management is handled through a global state using Vuex.
This wonderful website where I express my essence, work and code.
